explanation: [0-0] The video begins with a woman in a blue uniform and a blue hat with tattoos on her arms standing on the left and a man in a black uniform with tattoos on his arms standing on the right. They are standing on a black rubber mat outdoors, and the man is holding a large wooden mallet. The background is green plants.

[0-6] Next, the man in the black uniform demonstrates how to use the mallet. He places the mallet on the ground, grips the top of the handle with both hands, leans forward, and then alternates his hands down the handle until the mallet reaches its lowest point. Then he releases the handle and assumes a plank position on the ground.
